level.heading: EXPLANATION TO VENDOR OF RIGHTS AND RESPONSIBILITIES (ยง 29-217)

level.text: The Department shall furnish to each vendor copies of documents relating to the operation of the Program, including the rules and regulations which contain written descriptions of the arrangements for providing services, the vendors’ agreement, and the permit covering the operation of any facility to which the vendor shall be assigned.
The content of the documents listed in ยง217.1 shall be explained to each prospective licensee during training. At the time of licensing, a thorough review shall be conducted with each vendor.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: DCRR Title 6C, as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 27 DCR 4611 (October 17, 1980).
